info.name: E-Commerce
info.description:
A comprehensive API for managing products, categories, inventory, and intelligent product recommendations in an e-commerce platform.

## Overview
This API provides essential functionality for:
- **Product Catalog Management**: CRUD operations for products and categories
- **Inventory Management**: Real-time inventory tracking and updates  
- **Smart Recommendations**: AI-powered product recommendation engine

## Getting Started
1. Obtain your API key from the [Developer Portal](https://developer.company.com)
2. Set the `{{apiKey}}` variable in your environment
3. Configure the `{{baseUrl}}` to point to the appropriate server:
   - Production: `https://api.ecommerce.company.com/v1`
   - Staging: `https://staging-api.ecommerce.company.com/v1`

## Authentication
All endpoints require API key authentication via the `X-API-Key` header.

## Product Recommendations
The recommendation system uses advanced machine learning algorithms to provide personalized product suggestions:

### Algorithms Available:
- **Collaborative Filtering**: Recommendations based on user behavior patterns
- **Content-Based**: Suggestions based on product attributes and similarities  
- **Hybrid** (Recommended): Combines multiple algorithms for optimal results
- **Trending**: Popular products based on recent activity

### Key Features:
- Single product recommendations via `GET /products/{productId}/recommendations`
- Bulk recommendations for multiple products via `POST /products/recommendations/bulk`
- Personalized suggestions when `user_id` is provided
- Flexible filtering options (price range, categories, stock status)
- Configurable recommendation limits and algorithms

## Rate Limits
- Standard endpoints: 1000 requests/hour
- Recommendation endpoints: 500 requests/hour
- Bulk recommendations: 100 requests/hour

## Support
For technical support and API questions:
- **Team**: Product Team  
- **Email**: product-team@company.com
- **Documentation**: [API Docs](https://docs.company.com/api)

## Changelog
- **v1.3.0**: Added intelligent product recommendation endpoints
- **v1.2.0**: Enhanced inventory management features
- **v1.1.0**: Added category hierarchy support
- **v1.0.0**: Initial release with core product and inventory management
